Title: Provides that a dealer-controlled electronic table game shall not be considered a slot machine
Summary: Provides that a dealer-controlled electronic table game shall not be considered a slot machine.
LawSection: Racing, Pari-Mutuel Wagering and Breeding Law
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the racing, pari-mutuel wagering and breeding law, in relation to providing that a dealer-controlled electronic table game shall not be considered a slot machine
